text:
而她也第一時間認出這人也是當時[redacted_name]給她遞水時想要找茬沒能找成那個解差，
沒想到還有這般噁心人的心思，行啊，既然都犯到她面前了，那豈能饒過？
[redacted_name]眼神一冷，指尖㱒空出現一根銀針折射出銀光，面對那猥瑣撲上來的身軀，腳步靈活往右邊後撤閃身邁開，同時之間她的右手往男人後勁處掃過指尖的那根銀針就已經刺進了男人的身體，
trans:
She immediately recognized this person as the escort who tried to find fault unsuccesfully when [redacted_name] handed her water.
She didn't expect there could be someone with such a disgusting mind. Okay, since he has done it in front of her, how could she let it be so lightly?
[redacted_name]'s eyes turned cold, and a silver needle suddenly appeared at her fingertips, reflecting silver light. Facing the wretched body that was rushing towards her, she swiftly stepped back to the right and dodged. At the same time, her right hand swept out to the back of the man's neck. The silver needle at her fingertips readily pierced into the man's body.
